FuncDef:
The active port-flexe command activates FlexE interface licenses in batches on CM boards.
The undo active port-flexe command deactivates FlexE interface licenses in batches on CM boards.
By default, FlexE interface licenses are not activated on a CM board.
CLIs: undo active port-flexe slot <slotid> card <cardid> [ port <port-list> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of the subcard in the specified slot.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 4294967295.

Specifies a port list. The port lists can be separated using a comma (,) or hyphen (-).
The value is a string of 1 to 255 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the slot ID of a board.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before you configure FlexE services, run the active port-flexe command to activate FlexE interface licenses in batches.
Prerequisites
For a 2x50G FPIC, basic interface licenses have been activated in batches using the active port-basic command.
